sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'
import * as d3 from 'd3'

const RealTimeScatterPlot = ({ data }) => {
  const svgRef = useRef()

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!data || data.length === 0) return

    // Configuração do SVG e margens
    const margin = { top: 40, right: 40, bottom: 40, left: 40 }
    const width = 600
    const height = 300
    const innerWidth = width - margin.left - margin.right
    const innerHeight = height - margin.top - margin.bottom

    // Definição do SVG com margens
    const svg = d3
      .select(svgRef.current)
      .attr('width', width)
      .attr('height', height)

    // Escalas com margens
    const xScale = d3
      .scaleBand()
      .domain(data.map((d) => d.x))
      .range([margin.left, innerWidth + margin.left])
      .padding(0.1)

    const yScale = d3
      .scaleLinear()
      .domain([0, d3.max(data, (d) => d.y)])
      .range([innerHeight + margin.top, margin.top])

    // Atualiza os pontos existentes
    svg
      .selectAll('circle')
      .data(data)
      .join(
        (enter) =>
          enter
            .append('circle')
            .attr('cx', (d) => xScale(d.x) + xScale.bandwidth() / 2)
            .attr('cy', (d) => yScale(d.y))
            .attr('r', 5)
            .attr('fill', 'steelblue'),
        (update) =>
          update.attr('cx', (d) => xScale(d.x) + xScale.bandwidth() / 2).attr('cy', (d) => yScale(d.y)),
        (exit) => exit.remove()
      )

    // Adição dos eixos
    const xAxis = d3.axisBottom(xScale)
    const yAxis = d3.axisLeft(yScale).ticks(5)

    svg
      .select('.x-axis')
      .attr('transform', `translate(0, ${innerHeight + margin.top})`)
      .call(xAxis)

    svg
      .select('.y-axis')
      .attr('transform', `translate(${margin.left}, 0)`)
      .call(yAxis)
  }, [data])

  return (
    <svg ref={svgRef}>
      <g className="x-axis" />
      <g className="y-axis" />
    </svg>
  )
}

export default RealTimeScatterPlot
